CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 11, 1958, pg. 8, reads: "Walking the Picket Lines - As the hotel strike enters its second week here in Pittsburgh, among those employees striking against management and walking the picket lines are... (center photo) Mary Walker, Mae Lee and Sarah Smith of the Penn-Sheraton... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Mary Walker, Mae Lee, and Sarah Smith picketing with sandwich boards reading "On Strike for Better Wages, Working Conditions! ... Hotel & Restaurant Employers Union Local 237...," on sidewalk in front of Penn - Sheraton Hotel, Downtown
